snippet: President Obama, meeting with the leaders of the Group of 7 powers, faces challenges navigating the complicated waters of European politics.
abstract: Pres Obama, meeting with European allies on Ukraine, faces challenges navigating the complicated waters of European politics as he tries to forge a unified stance against Russian aggression; some leaders of Group of 7 powers are unsatisfied with his reassurances and others are unimpressed with his arguments for action.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Rick Lyman from Warsaw, Alison Smale from Berlin and Alissa Rubin and Steven Erlanger from Paris.

lead_paragraph: President Obama, meeting with the leaders of the Group of 7 powers, faces challenges navigating the complicated waters of European politics.

headline.main: Obama, Seeking Unity on Russia, Meets Obstacles
headline.print_headline: Obama, Seeking Unity on Russia, Meets Obstacles
